plot: "Hot Air Buffoon" The Mayor realizes that the Girls are doing all the work in his city for him. So he mans a hot air balloon and starts fighting crime the old fashioned way.

Hot Air Buffoon: The Mayor tries to prove to the citizens that he can be a hero like the Powerpuff Girls, by flying a hot air balloon and fighting crime. Unfortunately, his good deeds start to cause more harm than good, when he injures paid wrestlers and a construction worker who has gotten money at an ATM from his paycheck. The Powerpuff Girls must put an end to the Mayor's crazy antics for good before he causes more trouble in Townsville. Ploys 'R' Us: The Powerpuff Girls notice a bunch of brand new toys in their room, they are delighted that the Professor gifted them the toys, but they learn that the toys are stolen and the girls realize that the Professor is sleepwalking. Instead of reporting the theft to the police or the Mayor, the girls take advantage of the Professor's sleepwalking and they make him get more toys, but the girls will soon learn that their love for toys will have unfortunate consequences.
